Package com.iontrading.mkv

Class MkvTickDataCollector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iontrading.mkv.MkvTickDataCollector
  • @Keep
@KeepPublicClassMembers
public class MkvTickDataCollector
extends Object
    This class is used to registered instances of IMkvTickData to periodically report statistics about a performance indicator.

    For each MkvTickData registered to the MkvTickDataCollector, a periodic trace is added to the STATISTICS log every seconds, reporting the information about the tick value distribution.
    Interesting measures should be registered to the Java API, either at startup or dynamically, during component execution. For example: 

     MkvE2ETickData customDelayTicks = new MkvE2ETickData("Market Delay Absolute", "MDATA", "BBG_MDATA");
 Mkv.getInstance().getTickDataCollector().register(customDelayTicks);
 
 MkvTickData cpuTicks = new MkvTickData("CpuAvg", "BBG_MDATA");
 Mkv.getInstance().getTickDataCollector().register(cpuTicks);
    New measurement ticks can be captured by the application using the add() method on the pertinent MkvTickData: 
     customDelayTicks.add(currentDelay);
    See Also:
    IMkvTickData, MkvTickData
